title: 12/18/2020 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 12/18/2020 - Best of The Herd
description:
-Justin Herbert is providing the Chargers with clarity, don't screw it up

-Jon Gruden just isn't a great coach

-Drew Brees named the starter vs the Chiefs

-Patrick Mahomes may not have an easy path to the Super Bowl much longer


Guests: Albert Breer, The MMQB

Eric Mangini, former Jets & Browns Head Coach


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
